resources.string: The highest chakra represents our ability to be fully connected spiritually
Centre of chest (not heart on left)
spirituality & peace, transcendence of self/selflessness, expansion of consciousness, miracles & manifestation
inner wisdom and powerful intuition, clarity of inner vision, psychic ability, own insights, open to unknowns
good communication, ability to express self fully, truthful & authentic self, inner & outer self matches
Love for self & others, acceptance of self & others, compassion & forgiveness, genuine relationships
self – respect, power, endurance, motivation, effectiveness, fearlessness, true self, confidence & esteem
emotional balance, sexual (sexuality) balance, allowance of pleasure in life, trusting & in touch with self
grounding, safety & security, stability in life, stillness & peace, physical health & fitness, self-care and capability
Choose a convenient day to practice Silence/Non-Talking You CAN still do the usual things (perhaps not job) but will just be doing things without the added talking.

string-array.name: acc_type
string-array.item: Income
Expense

string-array.name: chakras_array
string-array.item: Crown
Third Eye
Throat
Heart
Sacral
Solar Plexus
Root

string-array.name: crown_mantras_array
string-array.item: 1. I am deeply connected to unseen powers
2. I am free from all limitations of life
3. I ‘tune in’ and receive energy at any time
4. There is no trying because I create what I want
5. I experience high states of consciousness
6. I am in a natural state of gratitude
7. Magical coincidences happen regularly
8. I am a glorious and radiant being
9. I don’t need answers: they come with ease
10. I control my destiny and manifest my desires

string-array.name: third_eye_mantras_array
string-array.item: 1. I see everything around me clearly
2. I access answers from within
3. I am deeply silent and reflective
4. I have a strong connection to my inner self
5. My gut feelings and inner wisdom inform me
6. My intuition guides and protects me
7. I experience stillness and peace
8. I have all the answers within
9. I am guided and protected
10. My potential flows freely

string-array.name: throat_mantras_array
string-array.item: 1. My voice resonates through me
2. I speak freely and expressively
3. My body supports my voice
4. I speak from the heart
5. My thoughts and speech are clear
6. I love expressing myself fully
7. I articulate and communicate with ease
8. I consider myself equal to others
9. I speak out and am assertive
10 What I say is valuable and interesting

string-array.name: heart_mantras_array
string-array.item: 1. May all beings be well and happy
2. My heart is open to give and receive love
3. I emulate love and warmth to those around me
4. I have compassion and forgiveness for others
5. I feel a deep love for myself and others
6. I learn from my connection with others
7. I let it go of negativity with ease
8. Life’s challenges as great lessons
9. I am grateful for all the love in my life
10. Love is everything: I am love

string-array.name: solar_plexus_mantras_array
string-array.item: 1. I am fearless and embrace the unknown
2. I take action and achieve what I want
3. I own who I am
4. I have a clear mind and strong character
5. I am assertive and stand firm
6. I am respected and valued
7. I am perfect in my uniqueness
8. I choose my own thoughts and behaviours
9. I honour and respect myself
10. I emulate personal power

string-array.name: sacral_mantras_array
string-array.item: 1. I embrace my sexuality
2. I am magnetic and attractive
3. I have intimate connections with others
4. My emotions are balanced and stable
5. I meet my desires
6. Life is sweet, perfect and fulfilling
7. My life is filled with pleasure and joy
8. I have amazing relationships
9. I express my desires
10. I am passionate and creative

string-array.name: root_mantras_array
string-array.item: 1. I am grounded and self-contained
2. I receive riches & abundance from life
3. I am surrounded by a blanket of love
4. I am safe and secure in my life
5. My body is important to me
6. I value my body, my health and my diet
7. I know my needs and meet my needs
8. I am protected, nourished and soothed
9. I can cope with any situation
10. I am strong and capable

resources.string: I’ve opted for a Silent - Non-Talking day
I’m keeping communication to the minimum today please respect this by not inviting conversation
Talking & Communicating burns energy, so I am taking a break from this
I am practising Mindful Silence today
I am having a “Silent Retreat” day today
Why Choosing a Sign? \n This is a scripted message to show people when they forget \n (or dont know) that you are practicing silence. This saves you from having to speak.
Discard your changes and quit editing?
